title: Submission Limits
description: Control when and how many responses your form can receive

maxResponses.title: Maximum Responses
maxResponses.description: Automatically close the form after reaching a specific number of responses
maxResponses.label: Maximum number of responses
maxResponses.reachedMessage: This form has reached its maximum number of responses and is now closed

timeWindow.title: Time Window
timeWindow.description: Limit form submissions to a specific date and time range

validation.limitMustBePositive: Response limit must be a positive number
validation.endAfterStart: End date must be after start date

closedReason.beforeStart: Form not open yet: Will open on {{date}}
closedReason.afterEnd: Form closed: Time window ended on {{date}}
